text: Luis Ramírez de Lucena (c. 1465 – c. 1530) was a Spanish chess player. ==Other websites== * Lucena's book online * Berliner Schach-Erinnerungen nebst den Spielen des Greco und Lucena by Baron von der Lasa, Leipzig 1859 - includes German translation and commentary on Lucena's work Category:chess players Category:Spanish writers Category:Spanish Roman Catholics Category:1460s births Category:1530s deaths
title: Luis Ramirez de Lucena
